name: Lo's Dust Bunny
description:
Controls:

Use the onscreen D-pad, or can you WSAD and Arrow Keys. The D-pad can be toggled off in the pause menu. 

Note: You can use full screen the the web browser, but the game was designed for a phone screen so the textures might jitter around at that resolution. 

Description : 

Cute small game made for Lo. First full game I've created start to finish.

"Make a game where you are a dust bunny and you go around collecting lost coins" ~ about what Lo's pitch was.

Created Match 8 - 27, 2021

WebGl Version: v1.1 (web app)

Android Version: v1.1 (Download below)
